data.name: Neopets Puzzle Adventure
data.detailed_description:
For the Neopets fan, Neopets Puzzle Adventure is a must-have game with its intuitive "pick up and play" gameplay, new never-before-seen areas in the Neopets universe to explore and the opportunity to redeem codes for exclusive virtual items at Neopets.com.

The game board itself resembles a chess board, while the gameplay takes the principles of Reversi and Go, and adds new twists that take the adventure to unexpected levels. The goal is to turn all of the chips on the board to your Neopet's color.

With a storyline based on the world of Neopets, and an entire virtual world to explore, Neopets Puzzle Adventure is the ultimate puzzle-adventure game.

  • Unlock all 10 codes that can be redeemed for unique items on the Neopets.com website
  • Choose and customize one of 12 Neopets to be your central character in the story
  • Travel through four lands of Neopia as you experience an epic story with more than 150 quests in the single-player game
  • Collect 100 "PetPets" for extra abilities and earn 30 special Awards for completing missions
  • Collect over 100 items, recipes and treasures, many of which can be equipped on your pet to provide useful bonuses

data.short_description: For the Neopets fan, Neopets Puzzle Adventure is a must-have game with its intuitive "pick up and play" gameplay, new never-before-seen areas in the Neopets universe to explore and the opportunity to redeem codes for exclusive virtual items at Neopets.com.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows XP / Windows Vista
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB (XP) / 1 GB (Vista)
  • Graphics: DirectX9.0c/Shader3.0, Nvidia GeForce 6600 series or higher, ATI Radeon X1600 or higher
  • Display: 800 x 600
  • Hard Drive: 8 GB
  • Sound: DirectX9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo processor or higher
  • Memory: 1GB (XP) / 2GB (Vista)
  • Graphics: VRAM 512MB, GeForce 8600 or higher, Radeon HD 2600 or higher
  • Display: 1280x720
